entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
